languages.text: "Это — древняя традиция династии фон Валанциус. Вступая в права Вольного Торговца, наследник приносит священную присягу на верность {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} и заявляет о себе, как о Его наместнике на подвластных династии мирах. Это — акт веры, который напоминает Вольному Торговцу о его миссии".

traits.locale_text: "Это — древняя традиция династии фон Валанциус. Вступая в права Вольного Торговца, наследник приносит священную присягу на верность Императору и заявляет о себе, как о Его наместнике на подвластных династии мирах. Это — акт веры, который напоминает Вольному Торговцу о его миссии".

languages.text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."
languages.original_text: "Это — древняя традиция династии фон Валанциус. Вступая в права Вольного Торговца, наследник приносит священную присягу на верность {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g} и заявляет о себе, как о Его наместнике на подвластных династии мирах. Это — акт веры, который напоминает Вольному Торговцу о его миссии".

traits.locale_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. As the heir accedes to the Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the Emperor and announce themselves as His steward on the subject worlds of the dynasty. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

"It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス朝古来よりの習わしです。後継者が自由開拓者の地位を引き継ぐとき、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に忠義を誓う神聖な宣誓を行い、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝傘下の星々の管財人である事を宣言します。こうして信念の証を示し、自由開拓者の聖務を再確認するという意義があるのです」
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス朝古来よりの習わしです。後継者が自由開拓者の地位を引き継ぐとき、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に忠義を誓う神聖な宣誓を行い、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝傘下の星々の管財人である事を宣言します。こうして信念の証を示し、自由開拓者の聖務を再確認するという意義があるのです」

languages.text: “这是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的古老传统。在接任行商浪人时，继任者必须向{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}宣誓效忠，宣誓成为祂的守护者，保障王朝诸多世界的安全。这不仅是为了信仰，也是为了提醒行商浪人牢记自己的使命。”
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

traits.locale_text: “这是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的古老传统。在接任行商浪人时，继任者必须向{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}宣誓效忠，宣誓成为祂的守护者，保障王朝诸多世界的安全。这不仅是为了信仰，也是为了提醒行商浪人牢记自己的使命。”

languages.text: «Es una antigua tradición de la dinastía von Valancius. Cuando el heredero de turno accede al cargo de Comerciante Independiente, presta un juramento sagrado de fidelidad al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y se proclama su administrador en los mundos vasallos de la dinastía. Es un acto de fe que recuerda al Comerciante Independiente su cometido».
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

traits.locale_text: «Es una antigua tradición de la dinastía von Valancius. Cuando el heredero de turno accede al cargo de Comerciante Independiente, presta un juramento sagrado de fidelidad al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y se proclama su administrador en los mundos vasallos de la dinastía. Es un acto de fe que recuerda al Comerciante Independiente su cometido».

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une tradition ancestrale de la dynastie von Valancius. Quand l'héritier accède au statut de libre-marchand, il fait serment d'allégeance à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et se proclame Son intendant sur les mondes vassaux de la dynastie. C'est un acte de foi destiné à rappeler au libre-marchand sa mission. »
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'une tradition ancestrale de la dynastie von Valancius. Quand l'héritier accède au statut de libre-marchand, il fait serment d'allégeance à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} et se proclame Son intendant sur les mondes vassaux de la dynastie. C'est un acte de foi destiné à rappeler au libre-marchand sa mission. »

languages.text: "Sie ist eine uralte Tradition der Dynastie von Valancius. Wenn der Erbe den Freihändler-Status erhält, leistet er dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} einen heiligen Lehenseid und erklärt sich selbst zum Truchsess der Lehenswelten der Dynastie. Dieser Akte des Glaubens soll den Freihändler an seine Mission erinnern."
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

traits.locale_text: "Sie ist eine uralte Tradition der Dynastie von Valancius. Wenn der Erbe den Freihändler-Status erhält, leistet er dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} einen heiligen Lehenseid und erklärt sich selbst zum Truchsess der Lehenswelten der Dynastie. Dieser Akte des Glaubens soll den Freihändler an seine Mission erinnern."

languages.text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığının eski bir geleneğidir. Vâris, Hür Tacirlik makamını devraldığında {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} kutsal bir bağlılık yemini eder ve kendini, hanedanlığın vasal dünyalarında O'nun idarecisi ilan eder. Bu, Hür Tacir'e görevini hatırlatmak üzere gerçekleştirilen bir itimat eylemidir."
languages.original_text: "It is an ancient tradition of the von Valancius dynasty. When the heir accedes to Rogue Trader status, they take a sacred oath of fealty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and announce themselves as His steward on the dynasty's vassal worlds. It is an act of faith that is meant to remind the Rogue Trader of their mission."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığının eski bir geleneğidir. Vâris, Hür Tacir konumunu devraldığında {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a kutsal bir bağlılık yemini eder ve kendini, hanedanlığa bağlı dünyalarda O'nun idarecisi olarak ilan eder. Bu, Hür Tacir'e görevini hatırlatmak için gerçekleştirilen bir itimat eylemidir."
